title: Embrace the Guiding Sakura!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>The cherry blossoms are in full bloom, huh. They’re beautiful.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You’re right. Since it’s like this, do you want to go somewhere where we can relax and enjoy the cherry blossoms?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That sounds great, let’s do it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I always come to this park with Rin and Hanayo, but I didn’t know there was such a big cherry blossom tree here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah. You don’t usually pay attention to it, but it’s so magnificent when it blooms.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....? Do you also come here often, Setsuna? It’s a bit far from Nijigaku, no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I came here with Rin-san to practice our self-introductions.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Self-Introductions? For what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Along the way here, I also thought of a very good self-introduction for you, Maki-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Like I said, what -selfintroduction?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>How about “Embrace the Guiding Sakura! Cherry Blossom - Maki!”? Try saying that on top of the slide!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m not gonna do that! I mean again, what’s with this self-introduction!? Why are we introducing ourselves!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
